sections.privacyPersonal: Privacy Policy for Personal Data Processing
sections.aboutUsText: MASTER-TUROV is a leading travel agency with over 15 years of experience in creating unforgettable journeys. We specialize in organizing tours, transfers, and travel services worldwide, ensuring the highest quality and customer satisfaction.

managerDescriptions.ceo: Leading our company with passion and innovation since its founding. Committed to creating exceptional travel experiences.
managerDescriptions.operations: Ensuring smooth operations and maintaining the highest standards of service quality across all destinations.
managerDescriptions.customer: Dedicated to providing outstanding customer service and creating lasting relationships with our clients.
